verses.verse: It happened, <S%H4428><s%> when all the kings of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> who were by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> how that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had dried up <S%H3001><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> until we had passed over, <S%H5674><s%> that their heart <S%H3824><s%> melted, <S%H4549><s%> neither was there spirit <S%H7307><s%> in them any more, <S%H6440><s%> because of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

At that time, <S%H6256><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Make <S%H6213><s%> flint <S%H6697><s%> knives, <S%H2719><s%> and circumcise <S%H4135><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the second time. <S%H8145><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> himself flint <S%H6697><s%> knives, <S%H2719><s%> and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at the hill <S%H1389><s%> of the foreskins. <S%H6190><s%>

This is the reason <S%H1697><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> circumcised: <S%H4135><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> who came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> who were males, <S%H2145><s%> even all the men <S%H582><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> after they came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> who came out <S%H3318><s%> were circumcised; <S%H4135><s%> but all the people <S%H5971><s%> who were born <S%H3209><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> as they came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> had not been circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> until all the nation, <S%H1471><s%> even the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> who came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> were consumed, <S%H8552><s%> because they didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to them that he wouldn't <S%H7200><s%> let them see the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers <S%H1><s%> that he would give <S%H5414><s%> us, <S%H776><s%> a land flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

Their children, <S%H1121><s%> whom he raised up <S%H6965><s%> in their place, <S%H4135><s%> were circumcised by Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> for they were uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> because they had not circumcised <S%H4135><s%> them on the way. <S%H1870><s%>

It happened, <S%H8552><s%> when they were done circumcising <S%H4135><s%> all the nation, <S%H1471><s%> that they stayed <S%H3427><s%> in their places in the camp <S%H4264><s%> until they were healed. <S%H2421><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Today <S%H3117><s%> I have rolled away <S%H1556><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> from off you. <S%H8034><s%>" Therefore the name of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%> They kept <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

They ate <S%H398><s%> unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%> and parched grain <S%H5669><s%> of the produce <S%H5669><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> on the next day <S%H4283><s%> after the Passover, <S%H6453><s%> in the same <S%H6106><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The manna <S%H4478><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> after they had eaten <S%H398><s%> of the produce <S%H5669><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%> The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> didn't <S%H4478><s%> have manna any more; <S%H398><s%> but they ate of the fruit <S%H8393><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> that year. <S%H8141><s%>

It happened, <S%H3091><s%> when Joshua was by Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> that he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H376><s%> a man stood <S%H5975><s%> in front of him with his sword <S%H2719><s%> drawn <S%H8025><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> and said to him, <S%H6862><s%> "Are you for us, or for our adversaries?"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "No; <S%H935><s%> but I have come now as commander <S%H8269><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s army. <S%H6635><s%>" Joshua <S%H3091><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and worshipped, <S%H7812><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H113><s%> "What does my lord say <S%H559><s%> to his servant? <S%H5650><s%>"

The prince <S%H8269><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s army <S%H6635><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Take your shoes <S%H5275><s%> off <S%H5394><s%> of your feet; <S%H7272><s%> for the place <S%H4725><s%> on which you stand <S%H5975><s%> is holy. <S%H6944><s%>" Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did so. <S%H6213><s%>
